select a.account as account, u.`name` as userName, s.cardNumber as cardNumber, p.`name` as provinceName, c.`name` as cityName, cy.`name` as countyName from zgk_user_info u left join zgk_card s on u.id=s.userId left join zgk_user_account a on a.id=u.id left join zgk_county cy on cy.id=u.countyId left join zgk_city c on c.id=CONCAT(SUBSTR(u.countyId, 1 ,4) , '00') left join zgk_province p on p.id=CONCAT(SUBSTR(u.countyId, 1 ,2) , '0000') where s.`status`=1 and u.countyId is not null
AND u.countyId like CONCAT(#{areaCode} , '%')
select sum(service_count) from zgk_expert_reservation_order_detail where user_id = #{userId}

SELECT detail.service_item as serviceType, config.config_value as serviceName, sum(detail.service_count) as count FROM zgk_expert_reservation_order_detail detail left join zgk_expert_config config on detail.service_item = config.config_key and config.config_domain = 'serviceType' WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY service_item
SELECT product.type,product.productName from zgk_system.zgk_sale_product product INNER JOIN zgk2.zgk_card card on product.type = card.productType and card.userId = #{userId} GROUP BY product.type
